title: Inpatient Detoxification
cleaned_text: The inpatient detoxification program at Tuerk House offers round-the-clock nursing care and physician oversight, as well as specialized counseling, to expertly and compassionately guide a patient through the complex process of withdrawal from drugs and/or alcohol. Tuerk House Main Campus 730 Ashburton Street Baltimore, MD 21216 The inpatient detoxification program at Tuerk House offers round-the-clock nursing care and physician oversight, as well as specialized counseling, to expertly and compassionately guide a patient through the complex process of withdrawal from drugs and/or alcohol. Each patient's detox plan is carefully individualized to safeguard his or her sobriety and make the experience as comforting as possible.
